00011 
00012 using namespace libpg;

00014 int BeliefStateCassandra::doAction (int action) {
00015         assert (action < (int)numActions);
00016         
00017         currAction = action;
00018         
00019         //update state.
00020         lastState = currState;
00021         //Vector stateTransRow (numStates);
00022         noalias (*stateTransRow) = row (actionTransitions [currAction], lastState);
00023         currState = Sampler::discrete ((*stateTransRow), 1.0);
00024         
00025         //update observation.
00026         //Vector observationRow (numObservations);
00027         noalias (*observationRow) = row (actionObservations [currAction], currState);
00028         
00029         currObservation = Sampler::discrete ((*observationRow) , 1.0);
00030         
00031         //cout << "start belief state generation." << endl;
00032         //cout << "action: " << action << endl;
00033         //cout << "Initial Belief: " << (*belief) << endl;
00034         
00035         
00036         btp1->clear ();
00037         
00038         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numStates; i++) {
00039                 for(unsigned int j = 0; j < numStates; j++) {
00040                         (*btp1) (j) += (*belief)(i)*actionTransitions [currAction] (i,j);
00041                 }
00042         }
00043         
00044         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < numStates; i++) {
00045                 (*belief) (i) = (*btp1) (i) * actionObservations [currAction] (i, currObservation);
00046         }
00047         
00048         (*belief) /= norm_1 (*belief);
00049         
00050         return 0;
00051 }
